item.description:
Welcome to the Tarot journey!

Tarot is a fascinating thing. In 78 cards the entire human experience is mapped. This mapping can be seen though the interconnected symbols, names and numbers shown on Tarot Cards.

The universal language of symbols operate at a deep level and communicated with us in our dreams and waking life. Tarot is a way to access your relationship with the Universe and to make informed decisions on the path you take. It can be used to explore our inner and outer worlds. It is immensely helpful to view our lives as symbolic.

So, if you have questions pertaining to your present or future, come ask one of our experts! I will have up to 3 readers for your queries and entertainment. Ask them what lies ahead for you!

Prices for ths event are as follows: 15 minutes...$25.00 / 20 minutes...$30.00 / 30 minutes...$50.00...YOUR CHOICE! Feel free to bring a bottle of wine or an appetizer to share,

You will be given a number when you arrive. Your number will serve as your appointment.

Come join us for a fun night at Terri's...have a cup of coffee, a glass of wine, snacks, and finger foods. Mingle with new friends and old! And have FUN!!!
item.how_to_find_us: White house with red brick front ...look for the gold balloons on the mailbox,

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Wine & Tarot Night II.... Ask An Expert!!!
